name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let me search that BS for you

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add support to the omnibox to search BS with search engines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Let me search that BS for you" adds the ability to search terms in various search engines directly from the address bar (Omni-Box) with the focus on results discussing the term being debunked, fake, a hoax or quackery.

Currently, the add-on suggests search in Google, Bing, Ask, DuckDuckGo and Yahoo.

Idea: Gilad Diamant http://sharp-thinking.com/
